IT Audit Control Simulator
==========================

A portfolio-ready Python project by **Komi Sowu** that simulates real-world ITGC testing:
Access Control, Change Management, Backup & Recovery, Privileged Access Monitoring, and Segregation of Duties (SoD).

.. image:: _images/project1-run.png
   :alt: Sample run output
   :width: 900

What you can do
---------------

- Run a default scenario from JSON
- Build interactive scenarios
- Export failing controls (CSV) and reports (PDF if enabled)

Quickstart
----------

From the project root:

.. code-block:: bash

   python main.py --config config/default_scenario.json
